CubicalBumper3D - a gizmo that represents a cubical bumper.

addConnection

public void addConnection(GizmoPhysics toBeTriggered)
                   throws GizmoPhysicsException
Description copied from interface: GizmoPhysics
Adds a connection between this gizmo and another gizmo The connection always results with any action performed on this gizmo triggering the action on all connected gizmos. this --> toBeTriggered, NOT toBeTriggered --> this

Specified by:
addConnection in interface GizmoPhysics
Parameters:
toBeTriggered - - the gizmo to be be triggered
Throws:
